sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { register } from '../redux/actions/authAction' const Register = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const initialState = { firstName: '', lastName: '', state: '', city: '', aboutme: '',username: '', email: '', password: '' } const [userData, setUserData] = useState(initialState) const { firstName,lastName, state, city, aboutme, username, email, password} = userData const handleChangeInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setUserData({...userData, [name]:value}) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(register(userData)) } return (
) } export default Register
